name: Lifestance Health Group, Inc.
description: Lifestance Health Group, Inc. is a leading provider of outpatient mental health services in the United States, dedicated to delivering compassionate care and support to individuals facing mental health challenges. Founded in 2017, Lifestance operates across numerous states, offering a range of services including therapy, psychiatry, and medication management through a network of licensed professionals. The company focuses on improving access to mental health care, utilizing both in-person and telehealth options to meet the diverse needs of its patients. Lifestance is committed to breaking the stigma surrounding mental health, advocating for wellness and recovery as integral parts of healthcare. With a patient-centered approach, the organization aims to foster meaningful connections between patients and clinicians, ensuring that each individual receives personalized treatment plans tailored to their needs. The company is positioned to address the growing demand for mental health services, driven by an increasing awareness of mental health issues and the importance of seeking help. By leveraging innovative technology and data analytics, Lifestance enhances the patient experience while maintaining high standards of care. As a prominent player in the mental health sector, Lifestance continues to expand its footprint, aiming to provide accessible, effective, and holistic mental health solutions across the nation.

seo.meta_title: Lifestance Health Group, Inc. | Leading Outpatient Mental Health Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Lifestance Health Group, Inc., a top provider of outpatient mental health services, committed to compassionate care and innovative treatment solutions.

faq.question: What services does Lifestance Health provide?
faq.answer: Lifestance Health provides outpatient mental health services including therapy, psychiatry, and medication management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lifestance Health?
faq.answer: Michael J. Garrison is the CEO of Lifestance Health Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Lifestance Health headquartered?
faq.answer: Lifestance Health is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA.

faq.question: How can I access Lifestance Health services?
faq.answer: You can access Lifestance Health services through their website, offering both in-person and telehealth options.
